title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: When navigating to the Info page of a Project and opening the Properties dialog, I see that the fields for Path, Type, etc. are displayed as text fields instead of being read-only.
EB: The fields for Path, Type, etc. on the Info page of the Project Properties dialog should be read-only instead of text fields.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Select a Project
2. Right-click and select Properties
3. On the subsequent Info page, observe that the fields for Path, Type, etc. are editable text fields instead of being read-only.
